intro.title: Massage - Dominik Pokorný
intro.subtitle: Relief from stress. At your home. Professionally.

description.title: About me
description.text: I’m Dominik and I work as a mobile masseur — I come to your home and give you a well-deserved relaxation and relief from everyday stress after a long day at work. If you have a long-term issue or a tense spot that causes you problems or limits your movement, we can work together to release it and help prevent it from returning.
